snippet: Jesse Kelly, the Tea Party Republican who sought former Representative Gabrielle Giffords’s seat in Congress, has dropped out of the fall race.
abstract: Jesse Kelly, Tea Party Republican who sought former Rep Gabrielle Giffords's seat in Congress, drops out of Arizona's fall Congressional race; decision comes two days after Kelly's defeat by Democrat Ron Barber in a special election to serve out the remainder of her term.
lead_paragraph: Jesse Kelly, the Tea Party Republican who sought former Representative Gabrielle Giffords’s seat in Congress, has dropped out of the fall race.

headline.main: Arizona: Republican Drops Out of Rematch
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Republican Drops Out of Rematch
